name: New Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain E3 demo trailer
text: During todays Microsoft E3 Conference, Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain kicked off the show with a gameplay demo featuring Snake infiltrating an enemy base to rescue Kazuhira Miller. As the demo trailer embedded below displays, Snake now has a whole lot of new stealth mechanics up his sleeve.Also on display is the more open-world setting that was originally shown when Kojima and company were calling this Metal Gear Solid: Ground Zeroes. Feel free to check out the trailer embedded below from the official Xbox YouTube channel.
